videos.title: Video: From Publication to IDR
videos.text: Explore linkage between publications and studies in IDR. View images and Regions of interest (ROIs) in IDR. Download the metadata associated with the ROIs.

videos.title: Video: From Gene to images
videos.text: Query for images associated with a gene. Explore the retrieved images and metadata. View the images in context of a plate.

videos.title: Video: Analytical results
videos.text: Query for images associated with a compound. Find Sars-COVID-2 screening study. Explore images in relation to analytical data submitted by authors.

tabs.title: Analyse Data
tabs.text:
The IDR server is built with OMERO, allowing access to all image data and metadata via an open API in Python, R, Java, MATLAB and REST/JSON. See the OMERO API guide for more information.

For examples of analysis tools working with OMERO to access and analyse data, see the analysis tools guide.

videos.title: Video: Compound analysis: SARS-CoV-2
videos.text: Build analysis environment. Access metadata and images. Calculate IC50 and download. Explore dose-response curves.
